PageDescription: Create collaborative online workspace in the secure cloud or host it yourself. Work remotely using features of an online workspace. Manage projects and emails, collaborate on docs, chat in ONLYOFFICE Workspace.
HeroText: Bundle of web apps for an efficient team management and online collaboration
DocsContent1: Store and organize business documentation. Share documents and manage access permissions for users and groups. Edit and collaborate on <1>text documents</1>, <2>spreadsheets</2>, <3>presentations</3>, <4>PDF files</4> and fillable <5>forms</5>.
DocsList1: Highest compatibility with MS Office formats
DocsList4: Private rooms for end-to-end encrypted document collaboration
MailsContent1: Keep your mailbox organized. Create corporate mailboxes on your domain or using the default one. Connect multiple email accounts, manage and tag messages. Create signature and make use of the template constructor.
MailsList1: Support of common email protocols: POP3, SMTP, IMAP
MailsList2: Unlimited number of mailboxes and mail groups
CrmContent1: Organize your business workflow from lead generation to order fulfilment. Create reports and monitor your team’s progress.
CrmList1: Web-to-Lead form for rapid entry of potential customers
CrmList3: Close integration with Mail, Projects, and Calendar
ProContent1: Organize your team for success. Create projects, prioritize tasks, and set deadlines. Track time and generate reports to analize your team’s productivity.
ProList2: Private projects and access rights management
ProList3: Integration with Documents, Calendar, and CRM
CalContent1: Manage your time wisely : create a personal or team timetable, add different event types, and set reminders to never miss a thing.
CalList3: Close integration with all ONLYOFFICE modules
VideoContent: enhanced security, optimized document management, Dark theme, and more
GettingDescription: Use ONLYOFFICE Workspace in the cloud, host it yourself, or launch a pre-configured installation.
GettingOutro: Community version for home use is available for download
WhyItem1Content: Extend your workspace functionality with your favorites apps and tools for logging, signing, authentication, or storage.
WhyItem2Content: Data encryption at rest and in transit. LDAP/Active Directory authentication. Activity tracking, audit reporting, and more.
WhyItem3Content: Manage your digital workspace using an intuitive control panel. Personalize it with built-in color schemes, replace logos, titles, links, set Light or Dark interface theme.
